body:
Hello again, Korea will be hosting another one of the Famous MegaScrims!

Time:

- In 1 hour

Rules:

All Avicus rules apply in the Mega Scrim, if you do break the rules we'll remove you're entire team from the scrim server so you're kinda dicking your whole team over by cheating.

Hosts:

-Me
-Acceqted

Teams Alerted:

-Apollo
-Assassins
-Xenarch
-Ethernal Cross

Team Captains:

The team captains for each game will be decided by the Scrim Server's Host.

First Match: Dawson vs _____

2nd Match: Acceqted vs ______

3rd Match _________ vs __________

4th Match _________ vs ___________

(if you want to be a team captain and get a head start feel free to contact me on skype and ask)

See you there :D
